column6: To transform KPN Corp’s procurement operations into a fully digital, automated, and compliant process. By deploying Coupa as the central e-procurement platform, the project will eliminate manual paperwork, standardize approval workflows, and provide real-time visibility across the entire purchase-to-pay cycle.
column7:
•	Efficiency & Automation: Automate procurement workflows to reduce processing time and manual errors.   
•	Supplier Management: Standardize vendor onboarding, evaluation, and performance tracking.
•	User Adoption: Ensure system usability with proper training and change management.
•	Integration: Seamlessly connect Coupa with ERP, HR, and finance systems for accurate data flow.

column6:
As a solution, this customized SAP program development connects internet banking functionality with the SAP system so it can be directly integrated in real time with the bank’s application.
The solution is cloud-based, creating a digital channel between the SAP system and the bank.
This solution simplifies communication and integrates with modules such as Advanced Payment Management and Bank Communication Management (BCM) for processes such as batching payments through bulk transactions.
column7:
Cost Efficiency
Checks/Giro incur bank charges of around IDR 25,000 per sheet according to the Finance team. When accumulated, this represents a significant expense.

Time Efficiency
With the integration mechanism from SAP to Internet Banking, the payment input process is much faster, since during sync the payment transaction is automatically posted in SAP and simultaneously the Maker transaction is automatically created in the Internet Banking application.

100% Real-Time Data
The Bank Ledger in SAP is fully real-time and aligned with the Bank Statement.

column6: The Logistics SAP Project aims to design and implement a centralized Logistics database in SAP, integrating data flows between the Trading, Logistics Operation, and Logistics Admin Support teams. The system will enable seamless data consolidation, automated extraction, and real-time reporting, significantly reducing manual work.
column7:
Improved Visibility – Provides real-time visibility of logistics details across all contracts, ensuring stakeholders can monitor progress, delivery status, and exceptions instantly.

Operational Efficiency – Eliminates manual consolidation efforts across Trading, Operations, and Admin teams, saving significant man-hours and reducing human error.

Better Decision-Making – Enables accurate and timely data analysis, helping management optimize contract execution, shipment planning, and vendor performance.

Financial Control – Maintains strong oversight on gain/loss quantities, product quality variations, and contract payments, minimizing revenue leakage and strengthening vendor claim management.

Compliance & Governance – Role-based access and audit-ready reports ensure secure, reliable, and compliant handling of contract and logistics data.
